Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Cozy Thai atmosphere, the dishes are a bit pricey but the portion is large. It will be great if it‚Äôs not so salty.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text:
I have been in Thailand and tasted the real Tha√Ø food and I can clearly say that this place serves authentic Thai food !
The people working there are nice and friendly. The food was great and the prices were quiet okay. Will go back there for sure !

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: I never get tired of visiting this place. Authentic Thai cuisine served with a service that could not be better. Friendly people and fast maneuver dishes available. You can walk in a few minutes from/to Heineken experience (love it). for more of this experiences, follow @quiquinnv

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Very good and authentic Thai food! The place is very cozy, food is delish, portions are big and the owners are lovely! Definitely recommending this place for every Thai cuisine lover in Amsterdam.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Great people, great food. Would 100% recommend coming here. Hidden gem in Amsterdam.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Top 3 Thai food ever had

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: A little piece of Thailand in Amsterdam. Authentic and delicious food.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Coming to this friendly place for +15 years. It‚Äôs great, just as the cook and it‚Äôs host. Highly recommended. Try the chicken cashew or green curry with garter.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Very cute restaurant with delightful staff. The menu is long, decently varied and the food is very tasty. The beer wasn't very cold when we went, but this is a minor quibble.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Great veggie options. Authentic food. Top service.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text:
Wanted to leave a rave review on TripAdvisor but couldn't find the restaurant on there!
Amazing place. Good, quick service. Friendly and attentive server. She knew the ‚Ä¶

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Fantastic and delicious food, and very friendly and fast service.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Every week since lockdown we get takeout. The two women running Siriphon are tireless and cheerful, despite their struggle to stay afloat in this time. And the food remains really tasty and affordable, as always.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text:
Value for money. In middle of city.
Host was good and friendly. Food presentation was good. Taste can improve more.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: The best Thai  food in Amsterdam. The real taste of Thailand they have Singa and Chang beer.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Been there with a group of friends. The place is small and quite crowded with tables so can get noisy but overall it is a nice restaurant. The service is fast and stuff very welcoming. Food was good, I haven't been to many Thai restaurants ‚Ä¶

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Nice Thai restaurant. Mix starter was a good starter and enough for 2 people. Fried rice was nice. Fried chicken with mushroom and oyster sause and red chicken curry with coconut milk was really good. Green curry chicken was nice but it has strong anise taste if you don't like it. It is good to book in advance by calling them.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Dishes taste great, if only a little on the small side. Try the cashew chicken. Their fried rice is also very nice. You don't usually have to wait, but sometimes they'll close early if it's a slow night, so don't go too late.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: My favourite Thai in town. Delicious top notch authentic Thai food and attentive kind service.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Best Thai in Amsterdam! Regularly go here to pick up my favourite dishes. In addition, the service is amazing!

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: The food was very delicious and the staff that's works there so friendly

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Nice place and nice people. Unfortunately the food was pretty bland. Not that it wasn't spicy enough, but it just lacked excitement. Given the many five-star reviews it received, I guess the chef had an off-day ?

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Okay Thai restaurant. Ordered Phad Thai, Fish Curry Tom Yam, Fried Rice for 4 people and Thai Ice Tea. Taste other than the fried rice is good. The fried rice is a bit bland. The service is very fast and friendly although the portion a bit small but reasonable for the price.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Super oily dishes, the fish dishes had soggy tampura that made it impossible to eat. We ordered wine and soda water, when we asked for tap water afterwards, they said they don't do tap water...Lastly they were super sketchy with the bill ‚Ä¶

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: The food here was very good -- but the restaurant's approach to water was bizarre, to say the least. We asked for tap water, which they brought reluctantly. Then one woman said the water they gave us was actually for another table and tried ‚Ä¶

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: The best and most authentic Thai we've found in Amsterdam. Friendly and welcoming service. Recommend both the Pad Thai and the sweet and spicy cashew chicken.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Excellent service, doesnt get any better than this. Not "westernized" but real authentic Thai food. Asked for extra spice and it burned my mouth just as when I was in Thailand. Great!

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Delicious food. But some things can be spicy. I recommend it if you are near. The owner is really friendly. It is a great prize for the quality of food.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: A bit hidden on a side street practically a stone-through away from the Heineken Square (Heinekenplein), this lovely resto has excellent food, a cozy atmosphere, moderate prices, and a friendly service given by the owner and her family.  Recommended!

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Very nice Thai restaurant, caters for locals but very friendly and welcoming to us. Bit difficult to find (not far from the Heineken brewery) but well worth a visit.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: One of the best traditional Thai restaurants in Amsterdam,no frills and no gimmicks just honest,authentic traditional Thai food the way it is supposed to be.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: I have been here many time and Everytime I feel happy to be back. Excellent food and great service.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text:
One of the finest Thai restaurants in Amsterdam. Cosy place. Tastfull dishes.
Almost 5 stars!

Name: Siriphon
Review Text:
Top marks for the som tam salad .
Great friendly service and quick also .
Clean and good covid measures.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Food was excellent, thoroughly enjoyed it. Lovely decor, good price and attentive staff.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Very tasty food, great service, oriental Thai food

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Good Thailand restaurant, is a bit small but they serve fast... They have vegan options and it's not expensive

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Good food and very kind and warm service.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Super cozy place with great service and amazing food! Would definitely go again.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Great vegetarian Thai food. Friendly lady owner, good price, and delicious vegan food

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Best Thai in Amsterdam, good tasty food and very affordable price

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: One of the best Thai food I had in Amsterdam and in general. Try the Cocunut dishes, amazing.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Great Thai food, and a soft and cozy atmosphere that many places lack in Amsterdam.

Name: Siriphon
Review Text: Great Thai food. Not expensive. Dinner for 2 with starters & drinks around 50‚Ç¨

Review Text: Small, cozy restaurant. Quick, friendly service. Tasty food at a reasonable price.
